verses.text: \w The|strong="H5221"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w concerning|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w before|strong="H2962"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w rise|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w overflowing|strong="H7857"\w* \w stream|strong="H5158"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w overflow|strong="H7857"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w therein|strong="H4393"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w therein|strong="H4393"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w wail|strong="H3213"\w*.

\w At|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w stamping|strong="H8161"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hoofs|strong="H6541"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* strong \w ones|strong="H1121"\w*, \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w rushing|strong="H7494"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w rumbling|strong="H7494"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w wheels|strong="H1534"\w*, \w the|strong="H3027"\w* fathers don’t \w look|strong="H6437"\w* \w back|strong="H6437"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w because|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w feeble|strong="H3808"\w*,

\w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w comes|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7703"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sidon|strong="H6721"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w helper|strong="H5826"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w remains|strong="H8300"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7703"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* isle \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Caphtor|strong="H3731"\w*.

\w Baldness|strong="H7144"\w* \w has|strong="H7144"\w* come \w on|strong="H7144"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*; Ashkelon \w is|strong="H7144"\w* brought \w to|strong="H5704"\w* nothing. \w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w their|strong="H5704"\w* \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*, \w how|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w cut|strong="H1413"\w* yourself?

“‘\w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w how|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*? \w Put|strong="H3068"\w* yourself back \w into|strong="H2719"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w scabbard|strong="H8593"\w*; \w rest|strong="H8252"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w still|strong="H1826"\w*.’

“How can \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*, since \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w*? \w Against|strong="H3068"\w* Ashkelon, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w seashore|strong="H3220"\w*, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6680"\w* \w it|strong="H8033"\w*.”
